"The mission of Google Translate is to make information universally accessible and useful regardless of the language in which it's written or spoken"
Updates are available for the offline package(s) you have installed
You must update Google Translate before you can download the latest offline language packages
Translate using speech, camera, handwriting, and while offline
With offline packages you can translate without internet connection. These files are very large. To avoid potential delays or extra data usage charges, use Wi-Fi only.
